sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

ensureUniqueParams.description: Whether to ensure parameter names are unique in an operation (rename parameters that are not).

allowUnicodeIdentifiers.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false

googleCloudFunctions.description: When specified, it will generate the code which runs within Google Cloud Functions instead of standalone Node.JS server. See https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/quickstart for the details of how to deploy the generated code.

exportedName.description: When the generated code will be deployed to Google Cloud Functions, this option can be used to update the name of the exported function. By default, it refers to the basePath. This does not affect normal standalone nodejs server code.
